name: Ecse420
body:
### Welcome to my Parallel Computing Repo
Here you will find the code I developed in my parallel computing course. I used Python and C, some of code such as lodepng, was not written by me. 

### Assignments and Projects
There are files corresponding to my assignments and final project. I worked on Python for the project, our goal was to analyse the threading support for computer vision algorithms in several different languages.

### Authors and Contributors
Almost all of the code here was written by me. I did not write lodepng, and some of the other files were provided to me in my course

### Support or Contact
Feel free to contact me and stephen.carter@mail.mcgill.ca.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
